name: Butterskate (later edition)
description:
Butterskate is an arcade-style minigame where you have 30 seconds to collect as much bacon as you can in hopes to meet the score required to win.

You are the butterperson, do what you can to collect enough bacon to make the goal! Use ﻿WASD ﻿or ﻿Arrow Keys to move.

Originally designed to be part of the 2014 gamejam #indiequilt on gamejolt.
(view original: https://gamejolt.com/games/butterskate_indiequilt/32023 )
